title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Sergio Rebolledo
raw_text: Issue 40 – January 2010 Cover Art by Sergio Rebolledo 2011 Finalist: Chesley Award for Best Magazine Cover Sergio Rebolledo is a 22-year-old graphic design student from Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. He studies at the University of Guadalaja and looks forward to becoming a professional creative director. text:
Issue 40 – January 2010
Cover Art
by Sergio Rebolledo
2011 Finalist: Chesley Award for Best Magazine Cover
Sergio Rebolledo is a 22-year-old graphic design student from Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. He studies at the University of Guadalaja and looks forward to becoming a professional creative director.
